list-item.p: Krisnachura ( Delonix regia), Sonalu ( Cassia fistula), and Jarul ( Lagerstroemia speciosa) are colorful flower producing ornamental plants grown in Bangladesh.

The flowers of these plants are rich in phytochemicals and exhibit antioxidant, anthelmintic, thrombolytic, anticoagulant, analgesic, antidiarrheal and antihyperglycemic activities as determined by in vitro and in vivo methods.
The flowers can be used as a source of safe and effective natural medicine.
